references.reason: This paper introduces GPT-4, a large language model that serves as a key comparative model for evaluating the capabilities of OneDiffusion.
Imagen 3 is a leading text-to-image generation model and a direct competitor to OneDiffusion, setting the benchmark for OneDiffusion's evaluation.

references.paper_title: Instructpix2pix: Learning to follow image editing instructions
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for fine-grained control in image generation that is relevant to OneDiffusion's approach.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper details a scalable architecture and training methodology used by OneDiffusion to achieve high-resolution image generation.

references.paper_title: Building normalizing flows with stochastic interpolants
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical background of the flow-matching objective used by OneDiffusion for training.
